Subject: FACES-(G -55) - Insurance renewal reminder - Al Khiran Mall

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Dear Dina,

 

Good day.

 

This is a kind reminder that the insurance policies for your unit FACES-(G -55) at Khiran Mall are due to expire on the following dates:

 

*	Property All Risks: 23rd September 2025

 

*	Third Party Liability: 23rd September 2025

chunks.text:
This is a kind reminder that the insurance policies for your unit FACES-(G -55) at Khiran Mall are due to expire on the following dates:

 

*	Property All Risks: 23rd September 2025

 

*	Third Party Liability: 23rd September 2025 

 

Kindly arrange to submit the renewed insurance documents at your earliest convenience, and please ensure to use the attached format for the renewal.

 

Thank you for your cooperation.

 

Regards,


Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer

chunks.text:
Kindly note that the WC policy is not approved. Kindly see below the comments and resend the revised policy:

 

Please note that WC policy no.: 02/WC/2025/002123 misses to specify the Landlord. Please include the following:

 

*	Waiver of Subrogation against Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes Company &/or their management &/or employees &/or representatives &/or contractors.
*	The policy shall not be cancelled, amended, or permitted to lapse prior 30 days written notice to Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes Company.

 

Thanks and Regards,

 




Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer

chunks.text:
Kindly note that the TPL & PAR policy is not approved as it has missing clauses. Kindly edit the policy by adding the following clauses and also I have attached the template FYR.

 

PAR Policy #PFAR2020-836 is not acceptable:

*	Waiver of Subrogation against M/s. Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes Company &/or their management &/or employees &/or representatives &/or contractors.
*	The policy shall not be cancelled, amended, or permitted to lapse prior 30 days written notice to M/s. Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes company &/or their management &/or employees &/or representatives &/or contractors.

 

CGL Policy #PCGL2020-84 is not acceptable:

*	Including liability towards landlord.
*	Including liability arising from fire &/or explosion.
*	Including liability arising from the use of lifting equipment.
*	Waiver of Subrogation against M/s. Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes company &/or their management &/or employees &/or representatives &/or contractors.
*	The policy shall not be cancelled, amended or permitted to lapse prior 30 days written notice to M/s. Tamdeen Al Khiran Commercial Complexes company &/or their management &/or employees &/or representatives &/or contractors.
*	Limit of Liability to read KD500,000. - anyone occurrence and number of occurrences being unlimited in the aggregate

 

Thanks and Regards,

 




Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer

From: Jenson Mathews <Operations.Coordinator@AlkhiranKuwait.com <mailto:Operations.Coordinator@AlkhiranKuwait.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 12:07 PM
To: Dina Al Wazzan <Dina.Alwazzan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Dina.Alwazzan@chalhoub.com> >; Louay Saab <Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com <mailto:Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com> >; Mustafa Ahmad <mustafa.ahmad@chalhoub.com <mailto:mustafa.ahmad@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Abdul Wahab Al Mishari <AbdulWahab.AlMishari@tamdeen.com <mailto:AbdulWahab.AlMishari@tamdeen.com> >; Faces KHIRAN MALL <Faces.KHIRANMALL@chalhoub.com <mailto:Faces.KHIRANMALL@chalhoub.com> >; Olfa Ben Romdhan <Olfa.Tazarki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Olfa.Tazarki@chalhoub.com> >; Darine Elkhatib <Darine.Elkhatib@faces.com <mailto:Darine.Elkhatib@faces.com> >; Roshan Dias Monterio <roshan.monterio@tamdeen.com <mailto:roshan.monterio@tamdeen.com> >; Olfa Ben Romdhan <Olfa.Tazarki@chalhoub.com <mailto:Olfa.Tazarki@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: FACES-(G -55) Insurance renewal reminder - Al Khiran Mall

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Dina,

 

Kindly update us on the expired insurances for the unit Faces located in Al Khiran.

 

*	Property All Risks – 23/09/2024    
*	Third Party Liability – 23/09/2024    

 

Thanks and Regards,

 




Confidentiality Notice & Disclaimer
